titlepage.titleproper: Allan Hines Reid Landscape Gardening Radio Talks, 1932-1933
titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
Special Collections Ms2012-082

defitem.label: Processed by: Adrienne Serra, Archives Assistant,

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.unittitle: Allan Hines Reid Landscape Gardening Radio Talks, 1932-1933
did.abstract: Transcripts of 15 radio talks given by Allen Hines Reid (Assistant Professor, landscape design, 1928-1929 and 1932-1933). The talks cover various tips for residential landscaping and flower arranging.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Allen Hines Reid Landscape Gardening Radio Talks must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Allen Hines Reid Landscape Gardening Radio Talks, Ms2012-082, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Allen Hines Reid Landscape Gardening Radio Talks Collection was acquired in February 2012.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Allen Hines Reid Landscape Gardening Radio Talks Collection was completed in December 2012.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Allen Hines Reid was an Assistant Professor of Landscape Design from 1928-1929 and again from 1932-1933 after a leave of absence.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Transcripts of 15 radio talks given by Allen Hines Reid (Assistant Professor, landscape design, 1928-1929 and 1932-1933). The talks cover various tips for residential landscaping and flower arranging.
